---
title: "Data"
description: Get Asymmetric SAM and Symmetric SAM indices in daily, monthly or seasonal timesteps
visual: false
---


<form>

  <label for="mindate">Start date:</label><br>
  <input type="date" id="mindate" name="mindate" value="1959-01-01"><br> 
  
  <label for="maxdate">End date</label><br>
  <input type="date" id="maxdate" name="maxdate" value="2022-06-30">
  
  <label for="timestep">Timestep</label> 
  <select name="timestep" id="timestep"> 
    <option value="daily">Daily</option>
    <option value="monthly">Monthly</option> 
    <option value="seasonally">Seasonally</option> 
  </select>
  
  <fieldset>
    <legend>SAM Index</legend>
    <input type="checkbox" id="SAM" name="term" value="full" checked> 
    <label for="SAM">SAM</label> 
    <input type="checkbox" id="SSAM" name="term" value="sym" checked> 
    <label for="SSAM">S-SAM</label>
    <input type="checkbox" id="ASAM" name="term" value="asym" checked> 
    <label for="ASAM">A-SAM</label>
  
  </fieldset>
  
  <fieldset>
    <legend>Level</legend>
    <input type="checkbox" id="50" name="level" value="50" checked> 
    <label for="50">50 hPa</label>
    <input type="checkbox" id="700" name="level" value="700" checked> 
    <label for="700">700 hPa</label>
  </fieldset>
  
  <input id = "get-data" type="submit" formaction="https://frozen-journey-02456.herokuapp.com/getsam" value="Get Data">

</form>

A description of the methodology can be found in the [methodology section](/methodology).
